title: Spatially explicit ecosystem accounts for coastal wetland restoration
content:
Publication date: February 2024

Source: Ecosystem Services, Volume 65

Author(s): Micheli D. P. Costa, Melissa Wartman, Peter I. Macreadie, Lawrance W. Ferns, Rhiannon L. Holden, Daniel Ierodiaconou, Kimberley J. MacDonald, Tessa K. Mazor, Rebecca Morris, Emily Nicholson, Andrew Pomeroy, Elisa A. Zavadil, Mary Young, Rohan Snartt, Paul Carnell
